categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Ela Radodan was a female officer of the Galactic Empire who held the military rank of lieutenant and was part of the Imperial forces left on Cloud City after the Duel on Cloud City. Her lover, Tal Veridian, was a rebel sympathizer. Radodan secretly informed her of Imperial activities as they conspired together to free a group of Tibanna gas miners captured by the Empire.
